items.text_for_match: Emery elated with 'fantastic' Aston Villa win Aston Villa manager Unai Emery praises his "fantastic" players in a hard-fought 2-1 win against Manchester United. Aston Villa manager Unai Emery praises his "fantastic" players in a hard-fought 2-1 win against Manchester United.

items.ja: Can Aston Villa sustain a title challenge?
items.en: Can Aston Villa sustain a title challenge?

Football Focus's Alex Scott, Nedum Onuoha and Glenn Murray look at Aston Villa's incredible Premier League form and whether they can sustain a title challenge this season. items.ja: 'It's an embarrassing time to be a Wolves fan'
items.en: 'It's an embarrassing time to be a Wolves fan'
items.text_for_match: 'It's an embarrassing time to be a Wolves fan' Wolves sit in last place in the Premier League with just two points from a possible 51. Wolves sit in last place in the Premier League with just two points from a possible 51.

items.ja: Given shares Howe's frustrations on trio of decisions

items.text_for_match: Given shares Howe's frustrations on trio of decisions Match of the Day's Shay Given shares Newcastle manager Eddie Howe's frustrations after a trio of decisions went against the Magpies in their 2-2 draw with Chelsea. items.ja: Gyokeres taking penalty was a surprise to me - Arteta
items.en: Gyokeres taking penalty was a surprise to me - Arteta
items.text_for_match: Gyokeres taking penalty was a surprise to me - Arteta Arsenal manager Mikel Arteta says he was surprised to see Viktor Gyokeres step up to take his team's penalty in the 1-0 win at Everton and says the decision was made by the players. items.ja: 'Do we want to be remembered for fighting or being cowards?'

Relegation from the Premier League looks inevitable for Wolves after a 15th defeat in 17 games - but will they avoid setting more unwanted records?
